mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CommunityBoard ( user_id, title, content, created_date, updated_date ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW() );
mapper.select: SELECT c.community_board_id AS communityBoardId, c.user_id AS userId, c.title AS title, c.content AS content, c.created_date AS createdDate, c.updated_date AS updatedDate, u.user_name AS userName, u.email AS email FROM CommunityBoard c JOIN User u ON c.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY c.community_board_id DESC

SELECT c.community_board_id AS communityBoardId, c.user_id AS userId, c.title AS title, c.content AS content, c.created_date AS createdDate, c.updated_date AS updatedDate, u.user_name AS userName, u.email AS email FROM CommunityBoard c JOIN User u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.community_board_id = #{communityBoardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE CommunityBoard SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_date = NOW() WHERE community_board_id = #{communityBoardId}
